summary: Summon your very own baby dragon
descriptionHtml:
Before you crossed the boarder there was a mage who did nothing by the rules and never obeyed any orders, her name was Misa.

The collage only kept her around because she was particularly adept at making summoning spells this time she went all out with study and made a dragon summon.

Although she is gone, her magic is slowly been found throughout Tamriel and the provinces... All she ever wanted was to be a exceptional mage.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Summon a Dragon Version 1.0 

Summon your dragon at 0.3000 the size!
No less powerful than a normal dragon ( Not Elder just normal )
Master spell! At most 300 Majika to summon him
Only lasts 30 seconds ( To balance the scales a bit )... Scales GET IT SCALES... I made a funny...
Complete book on the creation of Misa\'s spell
No dragon death soul absorption! That\'s right you little cheaters... Don\'t get any ideas!
Summoning Nibbles requires both hands... Use it wisely 

UNTESTED AND UNCONFIRMED PLEASE CONFIRM!! - Spell tome will be available in some vendors that sell Master summoner spells

Known issues :

- Nibbles can fly and if you run far enough away he seems to teleport rather than walk
- Companions clash with Nibbles and fight for space


Update 2.0

Your Dragon will fight with your for 2 Minutes!

Yes, that\'s right longer fighting more blasting mayhem from Nibbles your little summoned Dragon

Given the choice to have a 30 Second spell or a more Chaotic 2 Minute version

Enjoy!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This spell book and diary are located outside the collage of Winterhold sitting on a Window ledge
Located here : 

[b]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Umocaz-5WR4&feature=youtu.be[/b]

I am open to comments, suggestions and any request for spells you may have Comment or PM to me.
author: Misa

files.name: Summon Dragon
files.changelogHtml: Initial release adds a 30 second spell to summon Nibbles the Dragon

files.name: Summon Dragon 2
files.changelogHtml: Added a optional 2 Minute version... Either file will work without the other
